title: Retrieving Wrong Slot

labels.name: meta-bug
labels.description: Issues that identify a bug and require a fix.

body:
### Describe the bug

When calling the api for beacon block, there is a one-off bug for the slot:

ex:
req:
```
curl -X 'GET' \
  '<IP>:<PORT>/eth/v1/beacon/blocks/2900001/attestations' \
  -H 'accept: application/json'
```
resp:
```
{"data":[{"aggregation_bits":"0xf7bf7abffffdef3f","data":{"slot":"2900000","index":"0","beacon_block_root":"0xa86af90be36050734820488d53ca34dd10adf905e47ad54112bacb17af32c5a8","source":{"epoch":"90624","root":"0xb7ad9f6f961336a2eae59fe283204a22c6126543804cab3273068768afdffa7e"},"target":{"epoch":"90625","root":"0xa86af90be36050734820488d53ca34dd10adf905e47ad54112bacb17af32c5a8"}},"signature":"0x91ee211c9672868eec4e9bb899a0b4885f2b7a4e8806820d2ef6fb719bc162726d13d8f5a9c8fc3c25a9824530a9caca03619aae8c9db25449bc5560fada18a22da808ae50cdc68e6f04cbaad832c7ee16848ebd75bdbd6bac45a56603ce5366"}],"execution_optimistic":false}
```

^as can be seen above, the slot i have provided is `2900001` but the slot returned is `2900000` in the data.slot field.


### Expected behavior

I would expect that the slot provided would be the slot returned. however, if this is expected behavior, then this issue ticket can be ignored and closed.

### Steps to reproduce

1. call open api endpoint of consensus client:
```
 curl -X 'GET' \
  '<IP>:<PORT>/eth/v1/beacon/blocks/2900001/attestations' \
  -H 'accept: application/json'
```

### Additional context

_No response_

### Operating system

Linux

### Lodestar version or commit hash

v1.9.2/26fd079
